column4: I installed xfont-terminus package and According to /etc/X11/fonts/misc/xfonts-terminus.alias there should be an alias fontname terminus-24. But when I run xterm -fn terminus-24 it can't find the font. Nor can I find that font with xlsfonts. How can I fix that?
